# Introduction {-}

## Subject {-}

This article aims to give a summary, without proofs, of the principal results found in my work "Produits tensoriels topologiques et espaces nucléaires", which will be published in the _Memoirs of the Amer. Math. Society_ (and which I will refer to as [@PTT]).
